text: alm taelam 'ayuha almkhatb -walmrad eumum alnas- 'ana allah awjd alsmwat wal'ard ealaa alwajh alsahih aldal ealaa hkmth, wa'anah lm ykhlqhma ebthana, bal llastdlal bihima ealaa whdanyth, wkmal qdrth, fyebdwh whdh, wala yshrku bih shyyana? 'iin yasha yudhhibkum wayat biqawm ghayrikum ytyewn allh
